data.title: Saint Petersburg Convention Bureau
data.meta_description:
Established in the structure of the Committee for Tourism Development of Saint Petersburg, the Convention Bureau conducts large-scale work to promote the city as a world-class business event destination. The Bureau creates an effective one-stop-contact for foreign customers and organizers of business events, as well as attracts large international congress and exhibition events the priority sectors of the Saint Petersburg economy.

 

 The main activity of the Convention Bureau is to attract and support international

 associations in organizing major business events in the city. The Bureau is in constant interaction with specialists, assisting in the preparation of application (tender) documentation, design of the application, etc.

 

 Saint Petersburg Convention Bureau is a member of the professional associations:

 • ICCA | International Congress&Convention Association

 • Russian Union of Exhibition and Fairs

 • UIA | Union of International Associations

 • The Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Russian Federation
